DOC.detailed_description: Background : Percutaneous coronary intervention stent implantation standard therapy patient acute coronary syndrome . The in-stent restenosis still problem . Recently , drug elute stent reduce incidence unfavorable event . The primary role polytetrafluoroethylene stent graft ( PTFE ) management coronary perforation , closure coronary aneurysm , degenerate saphenous vein graft . We compare stent native coronary vessel patient acute coronary syndrome sirolimus bare metal stent , possible reduction in-stent restenosis . Methods result : During 6-month period 119 patient acute coronary syndrome , randomize either stent graft group ( n=40 ) , sirolimus elute stent group ( n=39 ) , bare metal stent group ( n=40 ) . Demographic , angiographic procedural characteristic similar three group . The incidence 6-month major adverse coronary event similar three group . The target lesion revascularisation high bare metal stent group ( P=0.044 ) . The primary end-point , restenosis rate six-month follow-up high bare metal stent group , compare stent graft sirolimus elute stent group . The percent diameter stenosis follow-up significantly high bare metal stent group ( P=0.005 ) . The late loss significantly low sirolimus elute stent group ( 0.23 mm ) , compare bare metal stent group ( P= 0.034 ) . There trend low late loss stent graft group , compare bare metal stent group . Conclusion : Three group stent implanted patient acute coronary syndrome ( stent-graft , sirolimus bare metal ) , differ regard incidence major adverse cardiac event . Sirolimus-eluting stent low incidence in-stent restenosis comparison bare metal stent group . Stent graft implant native coronary artery appear safe efficient patient acute coronary syndrome , significant reduction in-stent restenosis achieve .
